title: iPhone 15 Pro Max 256GB
description: Looking for a new iPhone 15 Pro Max with 256GB storage in Space Black. Must be unlocked and include original accessories. Willing to consider both new and mint condition refurbished.

title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: I'm looking for Sony WH-1000XM5 noise-cancelling headphones. Prefer new in box, but will consider open-box items if they're in perfect condition with full warranty. Color preference: black.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Need a high-quality ergonomic office chair for home office. Must have adjustable lumbar support, height adjustment, and breathable mesh back. Looking for brands like Herman Miller, Steelcase, or similar quality.

title: Nike Air Jordan 1 High OG
description: Looking for Nike Air Jordan 1 High OG 'Chicago' or 'Bred' colorway. Size US 10.5. New in box only. Must be authentic with proof of purchase.

title: DSLR Camera with Lens Kit
description: I'm an amateur photographer looking for a mid-range DSLR camera with lens kit. Prefer Canon or Nikon. Must be in excellent condition with low shutter count if used. Would like at least one zoom lens included.
